name: Earch
text: Chris, you're going down a road with no way back !

name: Earch
text: You can't go on like this, it's a guaranteed fall !

name: Chris
text: Damn, oops, how do we go back?

name: Earch
text: The best thing we can do is take a better road when the opportunity presents itself. In the meantime, avoid taking such paths in the future !
